text.data-name: HIRING MANAGER
CREATE JOB
CANDIDATE PROFILE
CREATE TEST
HIRING STAGES
USER GOALS
USER EXPECTATION
CUSTOMER SAYS
The need to hire a candidate for a job arises. Decide what content to post for the job opening
text.tspan: The need to hire a candidate
for a job arises. Decide what
content to post for the job

text.data-name: Hiring manager is looking for a right candidate for the job opening and he doesn't want to spend much time in filtering for the right candidate
text.tspan: a right candidate for the job
to spend much time in filtering

text.data-name: Middle-aged hiring manager who is struggling to hire right candidate for a job opening at his company. Going through a number of profiles and evaluation to shortlist candidates adds to his frustration. He hopes that his hiring process could be fast enough
Hiring manager wants to hire a right candidate so he opens up the website to post about job details
text.tspan: Hiring manager wants to hire a
up the website to post about

text.data-name: I want a perfect candidate but I don't want to filter him out manually because it's a time consuming process
text.tspan: I want a perfect candidate but
I don't want to filter him out

text.data-name: UNCERTAIN, BORED
UNCERTAIN, CONFUSED
UNCERTAIN, CONFUSED
ANNOYED, CONFUSED
CURIOUS, MILD STRESS
Create a job post that hiring manager needs to publish online
text.tspan: Create a job post that hiring

text.data-name: Hiring manager expects that job creation flow will be easier and intuitive where he can add job details and all the information related to that vacancy
text.tspan: job creation flow will be easier
and intuitive where he can add

text.data-name: Once hiring manager opens up the job creation wizard, he starts putting data in to the relevant field so that the candidate knows about the position clearly
text.tspan: up the job creation wizard, he
starts putting data in to the

text.data-name: I wonder how I will post the ad and share it on social media so it can reach to my right candidate?
text.tspan: I wonder how I will post the ad
and share it on social media so
it can reach to my right

text.data-name: There should be more options to define company and terms and condition in job ad so the candidate may have clear picture where they are applying
text.tspan: and condition in job ad so the

text.data-name: It seems that there are not enough options to describe about the job and the company information
text.tspan: It seems that there are not

text.data-name: Ask candidate about their personal information along with the short introduction video
Hiring manager expects that he can design the personal page by himself so he can ask personal information from the candidate according to the requirements and GDPR
text.tspan: page by himself so he can ask

text.data-name: Hiring manager then creates a customized personal profile through profile builder with his required options for the candidate
I wonder if I can plug and play profile components so I know what should I ask from the candidate at personal level
text.tspan: I wonder if I can plug and play
what should I ask from the

text.data-name: Make sure this profile can be completely of plug and play type so hiring manager can ask relevant or customized type personal information
text.tspan: Make sure this profile can be

text.data-name: Asking candidate information is not aligned with GDPR compliance. We cannot remove any information from the form
Create a technical test for candidate evaluation which he needs to undergo to qualify for the next stage
Hiring manager expects that he can design online test and scores for the candidate accordingly
text.tspan: he can design online test and

text.data-name: He then creates and designs online test for the candidate asking relevant test questions. These questions are based on multiple choices and some open ended questions for candidate
I wish that the test creation system will be easy to design so anyone could design a test in few minutes
text.tspan: I wish that the test creation
system will be easy to design
so anyone could design a test

text.data-name: Creating test should also plug and play so the admin can create pre-defined questions to add them while creating test
text.tspan: and play so the admin can

text.data-name: I can somehow create test for my candidates
text.tspan: I can somehow create test for

text.data-name: Evaluate the candidate on the basis of his test score. Test score's total sum will be equal to auto-score by system and manual score by reviewers
text.tspan: basis of his test score. Test
score's total sum will be equal

text.data-name: Hiring manager expects that the evaluation system should be fast enough so that he can easily select the shortlisted candidate according to the criteria he created
text.tspan: be fast enough so that he can

text.data-name: The system then scores the candidate's multiple choice questions automatically as soon as he submits it and sends the open ended questions to the assigned reviewers
text.tspan: soon as he submits it and

text.data-name: I wish that the system will evaluate the candidate's answers instantly and filters out the best candidate
text.tspan: I wish that the system will

text.data-name: The system should calculate the predefined score on the basis of answers and should compile a rapid report for the reviewers
text.tspan: compile a rapid report for the

text.data-name: My system is scoring in wrong format and I cannot find all the scores he earned
text.tspan: My system is scoring in wrong
format and I cannot find all

text.data-name: Allow candidate to pass through designed hiring stages to reach hired stage
Hiring manager expects that his team should easily move candidate to the defined hiring flows for fast and easy onboarding
text.tspan: hiring flows for fast and easy

text.data-name: Then the hiring manager or other team member puts the candidates to the hiring stages so all the members should see the candidate position after shortlisted by the system
text.tspan: so all the members should see

text.data-name: I look forward to a comprehensive hiring stage system where my members can easily manage their candidate's onboarding process
Members of the company can move the candidate easily in their hiring flow so all the relevant members can see the candidate hiring and onboarding process
text.tspan: their hiring flow so all the

text.data-name: CREATE HIRING FLOWS
Define hiring flows for the company team members for the relevant job vacancy
Hiring manager expects to configure and design his own hiring flow for his team so the members could use that flow to onboard candidate
text.tspan: hiring flow for his team so the

text.data-name: He then defines hiring flows for his team who are responsible for taking interviews from the candidates on different hiring stages
I wonder if I define a hiring flow for my team so all my assigned members can use that flow to hire a candidate
text.tspan: I wonder if I define a hiring
flow for my team so all my
that flow to hire a candidate

text.data-name: Hiring manager can create hiring flows on the go so each job can have different sets of hiring flows for better hiring process
text.tspan: hiring flows on the go so each
job can have different sets of

text.data-name: I really can't properly define hiring flows for my team
Schedule and invite candidate for the video interview if he is shortlisted
text.tspan: for the video interview if he is

text.data-name: Hiring manager expects that the interview stage must support video interview so that the candidate can be easily invited for the interview with his team members
The relevant team member then invites the shortlisted candidate on the basis of the score he achieved via video interview
text.tspan: candidate on the basis of the

text.data-name: I assume that scheduling a video interview would be fast and smooth
Video interview should have scheduler which can schedule meetings and generate alerts at meeting time
I can interview my candidate through video from the system
